form.IN:
Obliko
merest
uporabljamo za poudarjanje, ne pa pri primerjanju.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
mere
povemo, da je nekaj nepomembno, malenkostno ali majhno.

seg.quote: They were mere puppets manipulated by men in search of power.
He had found out only by the merest accident.
In Tanganyika, a mere 2 per cent of the population lived in towns.

sense.def:
Izraz
mere
uporabljamo v zvezi z nečim zelo preprostim, kar pa ima presenetljivo velik učinek.

seg.quote: They feared the impact the mere presence of a political prisoner would have.
The merest suggestion of marital infidelity enrages him.
